## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem/Use Case
What problem does this feature solve? Who would benefit from it?

**Example:**
"As a small business owner, I want to [do something] so that [achieve goal]."

## Proposed Solution
How do you envision this feature working?

## Alternative Solutions
What alternative approaches have you considered?

## Additional Context
- Would you be willing to contribute code for this feature?
- Are there similar features in other tools you've used?
- Add any mockups, diagrams, or examples

## Priority
How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Critical - Prevents me from using the app
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve my workflow
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Just an idea
